_header: Bright as an angel shining in his weed
_description: The Romance of Clariodus — in couplets: Book 1 (1576 lines), II (1938 lines), III (2442 lines), IV (2860 lines), V (3029 lines)

NLS1925.First Lines:
…Bricht as ane angell schyning in his weidQith force of speir
                    vpon his mightie steid…
NLS1925.Last Lines:
…Ane moneth iul did eft this tornayThat the knights did enn
                    counter day be day…
NLS1925.Editions:
Irving,  David,
                        ed.  
             Clariodus: a metrical Romance.
Maitland Club
         9. Edinburgh, 1830.
